name: MAZ!
description:
MAZ! - This is an exciting game to escape from a black hole.
Collect balls, raise your weight, so as not to fall into a black hole.
With each new level, the game becomes faster and more difficult.
You will not have time to relax!

Achievements
  • Many different achievements!
  • Get them for success in the game.

Cards
  • Soon.

Backgrounds, smileys
  • Soon.

Developers
  • XoDupo
